document_notes.text:
This update for gnome-settings-daemon fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-38394: Fixed mismatches in interpreting USB authorization policy (bsc#1226423).

notes.text: ** DISPUTED ** Mismatches in interpreting USB authorization policy between GNOME Settings Daemon (GSD) through 46.0 and the Linux kernel's underlying device matching logic allow a physically proximate attacker to access some unintended Linux kernel USB functionality, such as USB device-specific kernel modules and filesystem implementations. NOTE: the GSD supplier indicates that consideration of a mitigation for this within GSD would be in the context of "a new feature, not a CVE."
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
